amendment.description: To reduce unnecessary spending for reconstruction in Iraq.

action.text: Amendment SA 1887 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S12791-12792; text: CR S12791) To reduce unnecessary spending for reconstruction in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1887 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1887 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
